title: #44 - That Episode on Long Distance Relationships with Maria’s Husband, George
description:
Long distance relationships are brought up every week on Ask a Matchmaker on Instagram.

This week, we dig deep into the topic with The King and Queen of Long Distance, Maria and her husband, George!

They met in Boston while George was living up there and Maria was still in New York City. For the next SIX YEARS (!!), they dated, got married and had a kid while living hundreds of miles apart!

Don’t worry, they’re finally together in New Jersey!

But how did the two of them do it for so long? What could you learn from their journey?

Check out this very personal and heartfelt episode.

To learn how Maria can help you find love in 2021, go to: https://linktr.ee/agapematch

author: maria@agapematch.com (Maria Avgitidis)
